document_data.caption: Evermoor Way highlighted in red.
document_data.name: Evermoor Way
document_data.mainbody: The '''Evermoor Way''' is the road from [[Triboar]] to [[Bridge Gate]] in [[Everlund]], and extending to [[Silverymoon]]. Everlund has taken on the responsibility of keeping the road clear of danger from Everlund to Calling Horns, however has been hard pressed to do so in recent times.
document_data.Travel Times or Distances:
* ''Silverymoon'' to ''Everlund'', '''50 miles'''
* ''Silverymoon'' to ''Yartar'', '''320 miles''', via the Evermoor Way. 
* ''Everlund'' to ''Yartar'', '''270 miles'''
document_data.Places of Interest:
* [[Calling Horns]]—where Evermoor Way is joined by [[Jundar's Pass]].
* [[Everlund]]
* [[Evermoors]]
* [[Noanar's Hold]]
* [[Olostin's Hold]]
* [[Triboar]]
* [[Yartar]]
